thought: I want to craft a loom. The loom recipe requires string and oak planks. I have string already, but no oak planks. However, I do have warped_stem which can be crafted into warped_planks. Therefore, I will move the warped_stem from slot 12 into the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
